transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Mam good afternoon.

Customer: Haan bolo na.

Executive: Mam main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART ke office se kaise hai aap?

Customer: Haan haan haan. Okay. Mam aapka koi visit ke liye aayega sir kyunki usme na photo vagera upload karne hai na?

Customer: To wo puchna tha thoda.

Executive: Visit ke liye to nahi aayenge aap ek bar online hai to hum video meeting karke ek bar aapko pura

Executive: screen kara dete hai kaisa hona hai photo addition.

Customer: Ek minute ha.

(silence)

Executive: Sorry.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Aise aise baat hua tha ki hafte mein ek bar koi to aayega aapke waha se.

Customer: Mahine ke char visit honge karke.

Customer: Haan? Ki mahine ke kya lekar? Char visit karenge karke.

Executive: Mahine mein char visit online bola hoga mam ho sakta hai.

Customer: Online nahi bola online video meeting.

Customer: Online nahi bola tha yaha pe visit ke liye bola tha.

Executive: Aapke office mein kyunki aapka office ki visiting wali update to hamare paas hai hi nahi. Kyunki location ekdum different location mein hai aapki.

Customer: Nahi different nahi hai same location hai.

Executive: Isse pehle aapke yaha meeting hoti thi?

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Isse pehle kabhi aapke yaha meeting hui hai?

Customer: Nahi hui.

Executive: Physical meeting aapke office mein kabhi nahi hui hai na?

Customer: Nahi hui.

Executive: Wo to phone pe hi hua hai ya online hi hua hai na sara kuch sab kuch.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Meeting ke liye to wo wo wali location mein meeting ke liye possible bhi nahi hai na. Isliye meeting nahi ho paayi hai.

Customer: To abhi hum kya karenge usme abhi?

Executive: Abhi aapko jo bhi help chahiye aap online aaiye dekhiye aapko sara kuch online hi karna hai. Aap online aa jaiye hum aapko pura help karenge ki aapko kaise use karna hai portal kaise kya cheez kahan se kya hoga. Saari cheeze hum aapko batayenge hum log baithe hai yaha pe aapke liye.

Customer: Okay theek hai. Lekin visit ka jo bataya tha wo to utna to help karo na ki aapne char bar at least bataya tha to wo to aana chahiye na mam.

Executive: Mam abhi just naya wala sara open kare.

Customer: Ek to hume kuch pata nahi hai zyada usme zyada computer friendly bhi nahi hai to kya karenge aise isme bata do aap.

Executive: Mam dekhiye main aapki baat samajh rahi hu lekin kuch hai wo communication issue raha hai kyunki is wali location mein visit possible hoti to pehle bhi hoti. Visit visit jo hai is wali location mein possible hi nahi hai.

Customer: Ek minute mam ye cha ko rakhon isme aale na ithe.

(silence)

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Haan boliye na mam.

Executive: Mahesh ji good afternoon kaise hai aap?

Customer: Good afternoon mam theek hai.

Executive: Ji sir bataiye.

Customer: Actual mam hai na visit ke liye abhi tak mere shop pe koi nahi aaya hai.

Executive: But visit ke liye to sir commit kara hi nahi hoga na.

Customer: Nahi mujhe unhone commit kara hai ki aap hafte mein ek bar unka koi banda aake visit karega ya to mahine ka char bar aap bula sakte hai aisa baat hua tha mera.

Executive: Aapka ye discussion kiske sath hua tha Imran ji ke sath?

Customer: Yes sir yes sir unke sath mein hua tha. Actually kya hai mera aapka office idhar Swargate idhar hi aur mera nazdeek hai mera main Shukrawar pet mein padta hai do teen kilometer ka distance rahega bahut ho gaya.

Executive: Main ek bar baat karti hu sir kyunki dekhiye meeting ka to mere paas update nahi hai kyunki hamare paas jo company hai uske according to meeting nahi ho paati hai. But main ek bar discussion karke aapko ek bar update kara leti hu. Mean while jab tak meeting ka issue solve hota hai tab tak aapki ye jo cheeze hai jo aapko abhi issue aa raha hai service mein kya hum usko video meeting karke solve kar sakte hai?

Customer: Okay chalega na uske liye main aapko return call karta hu fir mam thodi der mein. Mujhe actual usme hai na thoda sa issue aa raha hai add vagera karne mein main aapko wo call karke fir apun logo ko shout out karte hai.

Executive: Haan koi dikkat nahi hai aap online aa jaiye jab bhi aapko time milta hai aap humko bata dijiye hum ek video meeting karke aapki puri help kar dete hai ki aapko kaise add karna hai product kis tarike se kya cheeze hongi.

Customer: Okay sir.

Executive: Meeting ki baat to main ek bar baat kar leti hu Imran ji se ki unhone meeting ke liye kaha tha kya kya cheez kaha hai ha.

Customer: Actual hai na mam aapka office yaha se bahut ho gaya do kilometer dhai kilometer ka distance hai nazdeek hi hai apna Yes Bank ke upar third floor pe hai. To main waha pe ek bar gaya tha uske baad mein fir main aapko online contact karke main directly le aaya hu.

Executive: Haan ye main bhi dekh rahi thi aapne khud hi question hai kaise call karke.

Customer: Haan main online online contact karke main directly le le liya fir uske baad mein mera wo time pe baat hua tha ki visiting ke liye aayenge karke aap hafte mein ek bar mahine ka char bar bula sakte hai ye yaha tak baat hua hai mera.

Executive: Matlab waise to sir dekhiye jahan visit hoti hai na waha bhi do mahine mein ek bar hoti hai matlab hafte mein ek bar to kisi kahi bhi nahi hoti hai.

Customer: Actually unhone mujhe jo bola tha unhone mujhe jo bola mam wo aapko bata raha hu.

Executive: But ha main ek bar Imran ji se discuss kar leti hu ki unhone ye cheeze aapko kyun boli hai ye sari cheeze main unse baat kar leti hu aur abhi ek ghante baad video meeting ho sakti hai aapke sath ek dedh ghante baad?

Customer: Haan chalega na mam aapko contact karta hu ek ghante baad.

Executive: Theek hai sir okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no visit happened yet.

- Wants help with product photo upload.

- States they are not computer friendly.



Resolution:

- Executive offered help via video meeting.

- Executive will discuss visit commitment with Imran.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back for video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- visit, video meeting, product upload, online help
